historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-2445.7.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-20, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-1109.01.

DC CODE § 9-1109.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If the Mayor at any time determines that the agreement authorized by § 9-1109.02 is not in the best interest of the District, the Mayor may terminate the District's participation in the agreement and its duty to perform the responsibilities set out in § 9-1109.04(5) within the District.
If the Mayor assumes the responsibilities set out in § 9-1109.04(5) pursuant to a determination made under subsection (a) of this section, the Mayor may promulgate any necessary rules.

subchapter.text: Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority Safety Regulation.
